findings.title: Possible SQLi in field 'nombre'
findings.detail:
Payload: ' OR '1'='1
SQL error pattern found: 'warning:'

findings.title: Missing: Strict-Transport-Security
findings.detail: The response does not include the Strict-Transport-Security header.
findings.recommendation: Add the Strict-Transport-Security header to all responses.

findings.detail: The response does not include the Content-Security-Policy header.
findings.recommendation: Add the Content-Security-Policy header to all responses.
